dict.string: Welcome to WhatDoWear: you can start adding new dresses in the section: wardrobe. If you want disable this tutorial go to settings
Add a garment: in this panel you can modify the picture (zoom, move, rotate) and insert its properties. You can add a bookmark using the toolbar

Here you can see the garments by kind. Using the toolbar you can select the garments sorted by season: hot, cold, both or all. Otherwise you can sort them by date or choice. Pushing the + button you can add a new garment into your wardrobe
This table show your matchings sorted by sporting, casual, elegant. You can filter the matchings by season
Create a matching using the garments from your wardrobe or shake your device! Tap the garment twice to zoom it. Check the matching properties pushing the tag button or dragging it up
If you want add a garment or look in bookmark, you can select the bookmark icon in the up toolbar of the garment or look form
